text: how much bacteria can crappy manners
really spread researchers at Clemson
University dipped hole and bitten chips
into water a quick dunk was enough to
transfer plenty of bacteria the glass
contaminated with the half-eaten chips
had 1,000 more bacteria per milliliter
of water but what about the real dips
researchers also tested salsa cheese dip
and chocolate syrup
immediately after the double dip all
three saw higher levels of bacteria but
the salsa had five times as much
bacteria as the others researchers think
that since the salsa is watery
contaminated bits are likely falling
back into the bowl after the double dip
however the salsas high acidity has a
lethal effect after two hours the
bacteria in the salsa returned to the
same levels as the chocolate and the
cheese our mouths are teeming with
bacteria so how bad is a little extra
several bugs from the flu to the play
can spread through saliva but the risk
is about the same share your coke but
would you trust what's in this guy's
mouth
